fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Trick everyone into voting you and when you are revived, choose to rampage at a player’s house each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you are hanged by player vote, you will not be able to haunt (like a jester) but will achieve your win condition.
- You will stay dead for one day and then be revived (come back to life). From that night onwards, you will be able to rampage at a player’s house, attacking anyone who visits your target or you.
- You gain Unstoppable attack and Invincible defense when you are revived.
- Control, Detection and Role-block Immunity
- Hang immune after reviving
- You were made by Phoenix to the (6) Investicreator.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Get yourself hanged by any means necessary.
